laboratory_examinations.findings: LPL mass was undetectable with results indicating <H1102120 ng/ml and LPL activity as <H9262 mmol/ml/min.
Maximum serum TG levels reached as high as 40 mmol/liter; levels occasionally reached 11 mmol/liter after lack of compliance with dietary restrictions.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Threshold serum TG level for the onset of acute pancreatitis gradually decreased.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Total cholesterol level was recorded at 5.6 mmol/liter.
Normal glucose tolerance in 1973; plasma glucose levels reached 13.9 mmol/liter at 2 hours post-glucose loading in November 2004.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Glucose tolerance worsened over time with insulin secretion decreasing.
